entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 09:09 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: ENE 48 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Blizzard developing this morning. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre early this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 30 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 increasing to 80 gusting to 120 this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the morning. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
